SELECT CODE_ID AS CODE , CODE_NAME AS NAME , GROUP_ID AS GROUP_ID FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE 1 = 1 AND USE_YN = 'Y'
AND GROUP_ID = #{type}

SELECT EQUIPMENT_STATUS , CASE WHEN EQUIPMENT_STATUS = 'Y' THEN '사용중' WHEN EQUIPMENT_STATUS = 'N' THEN '사용안함' ELSE '미정' END AS ATTENDANCE_TEXT , COUNT(EQUIPMENT_STATUS) AS PIE_CHART_VALUE FROM EQUIPMENT GROUP BY EQUIPMENT_STATUS ORDER BY CASE WHEN EQUIPMENT_STATUS = 'Y' THEN 1 WHEN EQUIPMENT_STATUS = 'N' THEN 2 ELSE 3 END

SELECT EQUIPMENT_STATUS , CASE WHEN EQUIPMENT_STATUS = 'Y' THEN '사용중' WHEN EQUIPMENT_STATUS = 'N' THEN '사용안함' ELSE '미정' END AS ATTENDANCE_TEXT , COUNT(EQUIPMENT_STATUS) AS PIE_CHART_VALUE FROM EQUIPMENT GROUP BY EQUIPMENT_STATUS ORDER BY CASE WHEN EQUIPMENT_STATUS = 'Y' THEN 1 WHEN EQUIPMENT_STATUS = 'N' THEN 2 ELSE 3 END

SELECT EQUIPMENT_STATUS, CASE WHEN EQUIPMENT_STATUS = 'Y' THEN '사용중' WHEN EQUIPMENT_STATUS = 'N' THEN '사용안함' ELSE '미정' END AS ATTENDANCE_TEXT, COUNT(EQUIPMENT_STATUS) AS PIE_CHART_VALUE, ROUND(COUNT(EQUIPMENT_STATUS) * 100 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EQUIPMENT), 2) AS PERCENTAGE FROM EQUIPMENT GROUP BY EQUIPMENT_STATUS ORDER BY CASE WHEN EQUIPMENT_STATUS = 'Y' THEN 1 WHEN EQUIPMENT_STATUS = 'N' THEN 2 ELSE 3 END

SELECT CASE WHEN GROUPING(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'MM"월 "DD"일"')) = 0 THEN 'daily' WHEN GROUPING(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'MM"월 "') || (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'WW') - TO_CHAR(TRUNC(TO_DATE(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'MM'), 'WW') + 1) || '주') = 0 THEN 'weekly' WHEN GROUPING(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY"년 "MM"월"')) = 0 THEN 'monthly' END AS TYPE , COALESCE( TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'MM"월 "DD"일"'), TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'MM"월 "') || (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'WW') - TO_CHAR(TRUNC(TO_DATE(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'MM'), 'WW') + 1) || '주', TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY"년 "MM"월"') ) AS TIME_PERIOD , PO_STATUS , CASE WHEN PO_STATUS = 'N' THEN '미결' WHEN PO_STATUS = 'I' THEN '진행중' WHEN PO_STATUS = 'Y' THEN '마감' WHEN PO_STATUS = 'C' THEN '검수마감' ELSE '미정' END AS PO_TEXT , COUNT(PO_STATUS) AS STACK_CHART_VALUE FROM PO_DETAIL WHERE TO_DATE(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - INTERVAL '6' DAY -- 최근 7일 (일별) OR TO_DATE(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') >= ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), -1) -- 최근 1개월 (주별) OR TO_DATE(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') >= ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YYYY'), -12) -- 최근 1년 (월별) GROUP BY GROUPING SETS ( (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'MM"월 "DD"일"'), PO_STATUS), -- 일별 (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'MM"월 "') || (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'WW') - TO_CHAR(TRUNC(TO_DATE(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'MM'), 'WW') + 1) || '주', PO_STATUS), -- 주별 (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY"년 "MM"월"'), PO_STATUS) -- 월별 ) ORDER BY TYPE , TIME_PERIOD , CASE WHEN PO_STATUS = 'N' THEN 1 WHEN PO_STATUS = 'I' THEN 2 WHEN PO_STATUS = 'Y' THEN 3 WHEN PO_STATUS = 'C' THEN 4 ELSE 5 END

SELECT CL.CLIENT_NAME , PO.CREATE_DATE , MC.SUB_ID || '-' || MT.GROUP_CODE || '-' || MT.MATERIAL_ID AS MATERIAL_ID , MT.MATERIAL_NAME , NVL(SUM(PD.PO_COUNT), 0) AS TOTAL_PO_COUNT , NVL(SUM(II.DEFECT_QUANTITY), 0) AS TOTAL_DEFECT_QUANTITY , CASE WHEN SUM(PD.PO_COUNT) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(NVL(SUM(II.DEFECT_QUANTITY), 0) / SUM(PD.PO_COUNT) * 100, 2) END AS DEFECT_RATE FROM PURCHASE_ORDER PO LEFT JOIN CLIENT CL ON PO.CLIENT_ID = CL.CLIENT_ID LEFT JOIN PO_DETAIL PD ON PO.PO_ID = PD.PO_ID LEFT JOIN MATERIAL MT ON PD.MATERIAL_ID = MT.MATERIAL_ID LEFT JOIN MATERIAL_CATEGORY MC ON MT.GROUP_CODE = MC.MATL_CTGR LEFT JOIN INBOUND_INSPECTION II ON PD.PODETAIL_ID = II.PODETAIL_ID GROUP BY CL.CLIENT_NAME , PO.CREATE_DATE , MC.SUB_ID , MT.GROUP_CODE , MT.MATERIAL_ID , MT.MATERIAL_NAME ORDER BY CL.CLIENT_NAME , PO.CREATE_DATE

SELECT CL.CLIENT_NAME , NVL(SUM(PD.PO_COUNT), 0) AS TOTAL_PO_COUNT , NVL(SUM(II.DEFECT_QUANTITY), 0) AS TOTAL_DEFECT_QUANTITY , CASE WHEN SUM(PD.PO_COUNT) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(NVL(SUM(II.DEFECT_QUANTITY), 0) / SUM(PD.PO_COUNT) * 100, 2) END AS DEFECT_RATE FROM PURCHASE_ORDER PO LEFT JOIN CLIENT CL ON PO.CLIENT_ID = CL.CLIENT_ID LEFT JOIN PO_DETAIL PD ON PO.PO_ID = PD.PO_ID LEFT JOIN INBOUND_INSPECTION II ON PD.PODETAIL_ID = II.PODETAIL_ID GROUP BY CL.CLIENT_NAME ORDER BY DEFECT_RATE DESC

SELECT CASE WHEN GROUPING(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PO.CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'MM"월" DD"일"')) = 0 THEN 'daily' WHEN GROUPING( TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PO.CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'MM')) || '월 ' || (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PO.CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'WW') - TO_CHAR(TRUNC(TO_DATE(PO.CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'MM'), 'WW') + 1) || '주' ) = 0 THEN 'weekly' WHEN GROUPING(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PO.CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY"년" MM"월"')) = 0 THEN 'monthly' END AS TYPE , COALESCE( TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PO.CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'MM"월" DD"일"'), -- 일별 TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PO.CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'MM')) || '월 ' || (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PO.CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'WW') - TO_CHAR(TRUNC(TO_DATE(PO.CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'MM'), 'WW') + 1) || '주', -- 주별 (2월 2주) TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PO.CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY"년" MM"월"') -- 월별 ) AS TIME_PERIOD , NVL(SUM(PD.PO_COUNT), 0) AS TOTAL_PO_COUNT , NVL(SUM(II.DEFECT_QUANTITY), 0) AS TOTAL_DEFECT_QUANTITY , CASE WHEN SUM(PD.PO_COUNT) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(NVL(SUM(II.DEFECT_QUANTITY), 0) / SUM(PD.PO_COUNT) * 100, 2) END AS DEFECT_RATE FROM PURCHASE_ORDER PO LEFT JOIN PO_DETAIL PD ON PO.PO_ID = PD.PO_ID LEFT JOIN INBOUND_INSPECTION II ON PD.PODETAIL_ID = II.PODETAIL_ID GROUP BY GROUPING SETS ( (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PO.CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'MM"월" DD"일"')), -- 일별 (TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PO.CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'MM')) || '월 ' || (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PO.CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'WW') - TO_CHAR(TRUNC(TO_DATE(PO.CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'MM'), 'WW') + 1) || '주'), -- 주별 (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PO.CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY"년" MM"월"')) -- 월별 ) ORDER BY TYPE , TIME_PERIOD

WITH TEMP AS ( SELECT TO_DATE(COMPLETE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS COMPLETE_DATE, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(COMPLETE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'MM"월 "DD"일"') AS DAILY_PERIOD, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(COMPLETE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'MM"월 "') || (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(COMPLETE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'WW') - TO_CHAR(TRUNC(TO_DATE(COMPLETE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'MM'), 'WW') + 1) || '주' AS WEEKLY_PERIOD, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(COMPLETE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY"년 "MM"월"') AS MONTHLY_PERIOD, AMOUNT FROM PRODUCTION_ORDER_DETAIL WHERE TO_DATE(COMPLETE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - INTERVAL '6' DAY -- 최근 7일 (일별) OR TO_DATE(COMPLETE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), -1) -- 최근 1개월 (주별) OR TO_DATE(COMPLETE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YYYY'), -12) -- 최근 1년 (월별) ) SELECT CASE WHEN GROUPING(DAILY_PERIOD) = 0 THEN 'daily' WHEN GROUPING(WEEKLY_PERIOD) = 0 THEN 'weekly' WHEN GROUPING(MONTHLY_PERIOD) = 0 THEN 'monthly' END AS TYPE, COALESCE(DAILY_PERIOD, WEEKLY_PERIOD, MONTHLY_PERIOD) AS TIME_PERIOD, SUM(AMOUNT) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM TEMP GROUP BY GROUPING SETS ( (DAILY_PERIOD), -- 일별 (WEEKLY_PERIOD), -- 주별 (MONTHLY_PERIOD) -- 월별 ) ORDER BY TYPE, TIME_PERIOD

SELECT CASE WHEN GROUPING(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(pod.COMPLETE_DATE , 'YY/MM/DD'), 'MM"월" DD"일"')) = 0 THEN 'daily' WHEN GROUPING( TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(pod.COMPLETE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'MM')) || '월 ' || (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(pod.COMPLETE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'WW') - TO_CHAR(TRUNC(TO_DATE(pod.COMPLETE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'MM'), 'WW') + 1) || '주' ) = 0 THEN 'weekly' WHEN GROUPING(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(pod.COMPLETE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY"년" MM"월"')) = 0 THEN 'monthly' END AS TYPE , COALESCE( TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(pod.COMPLETE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'MM"월" DD"일"'), -- 일별 TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(pod.COMPLETE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'MM')) || '월 ' || (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(pod.COMPLETE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'WW') - TO_CHAR(TRUNC(TO_DATE(pod.COMPLETE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'MM'), 'WW') + 1) || '주', -- 주별 (2월 2주) TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(pod.COMPLETE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY"년" MM"월"') -- 월별 ) AS TIME_PERIOD , NVL(SUM(pi.TOTAL_QUANTITY), 0) AS TOTAL_QUANTITY , NVL(SUM(pi.DEFECT_QUANTITY), 0) AS TOTAL_DEFECT_QUANTITY , CASE WHEN SUM(pi.TOTAL_QUANTITY) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(NVL(SUM(pi.DEFECT_QUANTITY), 0) / SUM(pi.TOTAL_QUANTITY) * 100, 2) END AS DEFECT_RATE FROM PRODUCTION_ORDER_DETAIL pod INNER JOIN PRODUCTION_INSPECTION pi ON pod.PRODUCTION_ORDER_DETAIL_ID = pi.PRODUCTION_ORDER_DETAIL_ID GROUP BY GROUPING SETS ( (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(pod.COMPLETE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'MM"월" DD"일"')), -- 일별 (TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(pod.COMPLETE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'MM')) || '월 ' || (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(pod.COMPLETE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'WW') - TO_CHAR(TRUNC(TO_DATE(pod.COMPLETE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'MM'), 'WW') + 1) || '주'), -- 주별 (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(pod.COMPLETE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY"년" MM"월"')) -- 월별 ) ORDER BY TYPE , TIME_PERIOD

SELECT pod.PRODUCTION_ORDER_DETAIL_ID AS PRODUCTION_ORDER_DETAIL_ID , pl.ITEM_ID AS ITEM_ID , i.ITEM_NAME AS ITEM_NAME , i.ITEM_UNIT AS ITEM_UNIT , pi.TOTAL_QUANTITY AS TOTAL_QUANTITY , pi.DEFECT_QUANTITY AS DEFECT_QUANTITY , mc.SUB_NAME AS STATUS_NAME , pi.CREATE_DATE AS CREATE_DATE , pod.COMPLETE_DATE AS COMPLETE_DATE FROM PRODUCTION_ORDER_DETAIL pod INNER JOIN PRODUCTION_LOT pl ON pod.PRODUCTION_ORDER_DETAIL_ID = pl.PRODUCTION_ORDER_DETAIL_ID INNER JOIN PRODUCTION_INSPECTION pi ON pl.PRODUCTION_ORDER_DETAIL_ID = pi.PRODUCTION_ORDER_DETAIL_ID INNER JOIN ITEM i ON pl.ITEM_ID = i.ITEM_ID INNER JOIN MES_COMMON mc ON pod.STATUS = mc.CLASSIFICATION_ID ORDER BY pod.COMPLETE_DATE , pod.COMPLETE_TIME ASC
SELECT PL.PRODUCTION_LOT_ID , IT.ITEM_ID , IT.ITEM_NAME , IT.ITEM_TYPE FROM PRODUCTION_LOT PL INNER JOIN ITEM IT ON PL.ITEM_ID = IT.ITEM_ID WHERE IT.ITEM_TYPE = '완제품'
